description: Albania on 18th of March declared that only authorized vehicles that transport goods and those, whether personal or not, of employees of public and private institutions will be allowed to move from 5:00 to 8:00.
Albania on March 16 enforced a curfew from 6PM - 6AM.
Albania on April 17, 2020 declared that the seniors are allowed to move outside their houses on Saturday, April 18 until 11:00.
Albania on April 18, 2020 declared that mothers and their children (up to 10 years old) are allowed to move on Sunday, April 19 until 11:00.
On the 24th of April 2020, Albania declared that on Saturday, April 25 seniors are allowed to move outside until 11:00.
Albania on April 24 declared that mothers and their children (up to 10 years old) will be allowed to move outside on Sunday, April 26 until 11:00 am.

Albania on April 25 declared that seniors can move freely from 6:00 am to 8:30 am only the in low risk towns of Diber and Gjirokaster along with the municipalities of Pogradec, Prrenjas, Librazhd, Saranda, Delvine, Himara, Konispol, Finiq, and Divjak. The policy starts on April 27th.
Albania on April 30 declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 2nd and 3rd of May 2020, movement of parents with their children (up to 14 years old) will be allowed from 11:00 to 17:30.
Albania on April 30 declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 2nd and 3rd of May 2020, seniors are allowed to move outside until 10:00 am.
On 8 May Albania declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 9th and 10th of May 2020, movement of parents with their children (up to 14 years old) will be allowed from 11:00 to 17:30.
On May 8, Albania declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 9th and 10th of May 2020, seniors are allowed to move outside until 10:00 am.
Albania is removing curfew restrictions in all parts of Albania starting on June 1st.
Albania is relaxing curfew restrictions in red zone cities starting on May 18th. All residents can travel freely from 5AM until 9PM.
On May 22 Albania declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 23rd and 24th of May 2020, movement of parents with their children (up to 14 years old) will be allowed after 11:00 am.
On May 22 Albania declared that on Saturday and Sunday, 23rd and 24th of May 2020, seniors are allowed to move outside until 10:00 am accompanied with another person.
Albania declared on the 9th of November that starting from Wednesday, November 11, a new curfew will be enforced. Fromm 22:00 until 6:00 people are not allowed to move outside.
Albania on the 24th of on March, declared a state of emergency for 30 days.
Albania will extend the state of emergency until June 23rd.
Albania closed the border with Greece for land and air travel on March 14th.

description: Albania on April 7 declared that it is enforcing a two-week quarantine on all Albanian citizens that wish to enter the country through land borders. These citizens must not be residents in other countries because if so they will not be allowed to enter Albania.
